name: Dinosaur Simulator Trex Destruction Jurassic Forest & City Hungry Dino Carnage
name_original: Dinosaur Simulator Trex Destruction Jurassic Forest & City Hungry Dino Carnage
description:
A really Amazing Dinosaur game is ready for you!! If you like playing dinosaur games you will love this one.
Dinosaur Simulator is a thrilling 3D game. Explore the huge city map with your giant 3D Dinosaur.

Experience Amazing 3D graphics and prehistoric Jurassic park environments. Play the real dinosaur game and have lot of fun in destroying city!! Smash the city and be the massive dinosaur and roam around the extreme locations. Race against a car, smash into a moving vehicle. Have a fun of tilting and smashing the world with lot of noise. Dinosaur games are always fun and this one will make you go crazy. Get yourself ready for the thrilling experience.

Dinosaur Simulator is a unique game with amazingly realistic physics. This game will show the wildness in depth. This game is ultimate, chaotic way! Explore the huge city map with your giant 3D Dinosaur. This Dinosaur simulator is something you will not want to miss.


Game Features:

- Amazing 3D graphics
- Many thrilling levels
- Fabulous City Environments
- Strong and powerful animal.
- Fabulous sound effects.

How to Play:-

- Use the joystick to move.
- Tap right button to jump
